title: I haven't got any blue essence from my runes? will i get them?
body: I haven't got any blue essence from my runes? will i get them?

replies.body: Hey, I checked this out for you but there weren't any runes purchased before the Sept 1 cut off.  There's no mission on this specific account because there's no content to be converted.  Sorry about that!
What about those of us who listened to you and didn't disenchant our Skin Shards....
